author: David Fiol
comment: Every time they update this app they fix one problem and create two more.  Latest problem is that the miles per gallon rating in the trip log is useless. It goes from .1 mpg to 5000 plus mpg.   Never a credible number.  And these guys want to sell us a self-driving car someday?

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of issues using the app. If you’re continuing to experience fingerprint login issues with the latest version of the app, please contact help desk 800-392 3673, choose your language and option 3 for Technology. We will be happy to get more details to assist you in getting your concern resolved.

author: Blake
comment: Don't like the new interface. Fuel gauge is really small. Interface is generally slow to respond. Always reports MPG as 0.1. Someone forgot to write their unit tests... Vehicle updates are slow and sometimes fail to update at all.

author: Craig von Land
comment: User interface takes too long to enable buttons to remote start or lock doors. I should be able to open the app and issue the command immediately, and then let the app make the connection in the background so I'm not forced to wait. That's just poor UI design.

author: Sean Landgraf
comment: At first the app didn't work. However, I went to the ford dealer and they updated my 2017 Ford fusion Energi. Now it works great!

author: Bree Boothe
comment: Won't update. Every time I open it tries to update and fails. All my car information is from last August. I use to like this app when it worked.

author: Trevin Pick
comment: Generally works well especially the charging mobile alerts and remote start.  One annoying issue is the Trip and charge log fuel economy MPG rating is always wrong.  On my 35 mile drive this morning it said my economy was 3104 MPG.  This was working a few months ago when originally installed.  Any fix for it?

author: LvCruz 05
comment: The app used to work, now nothing will update. It just says "updated 2 days ago". It's said that for well over 3 months. I used to actually like using this app.

author: Andrew M
comment: Better, would be nice to have smart watch app for gear s3 to remote start

author: Kris Hoffmeyer
comment: Electric car won't drive electric only. App doesn't tell me why. The mileage listed are wrong. Not useful at all.

author: Farshad Allahdadi
comment: Stopped updating vehicle information. Can't get it to sync.

author: Eliisa Griffin Austin
comment: Doesn't work at all despite repeated installations.
Now the green progress bar under the % charged is stuck on 3/4 regardless of the %.  Come on Ford, trying to love this.

author: J Alexander
comment: Fuel economy not working in trip charge log.

author: Richard Rose
comment: I have had 2 other Ford hybrids/PIH using this app and worked very well over the years however on my new PIH app hasn't been able to sync or connect to my vehicle over the last 3 months. I was instructed to have the modem check which I have been told is working fine. I have uninstalled and reinstalled several times still no connection, won't update!!

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of your issues with our app.  A firmware update for our Telematics Control unit , Inoperative Remote Commands From MyFord Mobile Phone App, is available at the dealership. If you’re continuing to experience these issues, please contact 800-392 3673 to further assist you in getting your concerns resolved.

author: Julie Seigler
comment: The app has kicked me out, won't send password reset to phone or email. Won't let me reregister with same phone number. So frustrating! Will ask dealer to assist getting customer service.

author: Garry Mc
comment: Complete waste of time! Keeps saying incorrect password so I  clicked on forgot password button was emailed new password and that does exactly the same! Come on Ford you should do better than this! Uninstalling!

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of your login issues.  If you’re continuing to experience these issues with the latest version of the app, please contact help desk 800-392 3673, choose your language and option 3 for Technology. We will be happy to get more details to assist you in getting your concern resolved.

author: Chris Smith
comment: It only works once then it fails and customer service is always closed.  No functional password reset and it does not remember you.  This is a stress creation app.

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of your login issues.  If you’re continuing to experience these issues with the latest version of the app, please contact help desk 800-392 3673, M-F 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM EST. We will be happy to get more details to assist you in getting your concern resolved.

author: Chris Matos
comment: I have to reconnect the car on a weekly basis, sometimes more.  Nothing more disappointing than checking to see what % the charge is at, to see that the car needs to be registered again.  Value charging never works, it doesn't matter what times you set.

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of your authorization issues.  If you’re continuing to experience these issues with the latest version of the app, please contact help desk 800-392 3673, choose your language and option 3 for Technology. We will be happy to get more details to assist you in getting your concern resolved.

author: Daniel Spector
comment: I work for a Ford dealer so I am well versed in the functionality of this app and Ford Pass. Very happy with the features offered but I am also very displeased as to how slow and unreliable this app is compared to Ford Pass. The vehicle info update takes far too long and blocks out ability to start/lock/unlock the car. Love the features, just wish it was more efficient.

I do like the app, but it does not keep accurate records.  Drove over 800 miles and it recorded 530.  Had over 4,000 miles on one tank of gas and it only recorded 2700.  There are a lot of dropped travel logs since I purchased my car.   Overall, the Ford Fusion Energi is great and the app is okay.  At least the remote start and door lock features work well.

author: Necie B.
comment: I just purchased my car yesterday and after downloading ford pass it said I needed this app. Well whenever I go to login it says network error try again. Once I get in, it wants me to resync my car. Its super frustrating and annoying. Compared to Chevys app (my former car was a Chevy) I would  give it 0 stars if I could. Ugh

author: Ron M
comment: The AP works for awhile, then claims it doesn't recognize your password.  Its very inconsistent and frustrating.  When it works it is very helpful.

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of your login issues.  If you’re continuing to experience these issues with the latest version of the app, please contact help desk 800-392 3673, choose your language and option 3 for Technology. We will be happy to get more details to assist you in getting your concern resolved.

author: Steve Fradley
comment: On the latest version, I now get a white pop up with the message "Error registering device - __error__.”.  Whenever I try and do something. The error clears and the app still works, but it's annoying that this pop up has started to appear every time now. I've tried clearing data and cache from the app, and reinstalling, but the pop up won't stop.

author: Robert Esqueda
comment: Error registering, even though I've had this account for several years now. Won't let me make a new one or use my old one.

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of your issues with our app.  If you’re continuing to experience these issues with the latest version of the app, please contact help desk 800-392 3673, choose your language and option 3 for Technology. We will be happy to get more details to assist you in getting your concern resolved.

author: Nilabh Chaudhary
comment: Mediocre, primitive, slow. Works intermittently. Doesn't work well outside. Clearly, Ford managers have never used this product. No pride in quality.

author: David Nichnadowicz
comment: Works well after the last update. Haven't had any problems with this at all since then.

author: Richard Canny
comment: Unfortunately I have pretty much given up on this app. If the app is ever working well, it's great. It always has problems connecting with the vehicle. And as luck would have it, this is always worse in the winters. After installing, and reinstalling it various different times, as well as completely deleting the vehicles and re-installing them it is still no more reliable than it ever was. After resetting the modem in the vehicle by removing and reinstalling the fuse, the performance is better for about 3 months. Then back to all the old problems. I've had two different Fusion plug-in hybrids over a four-year period. Time to move on to something that works. The average rating of this app has been between two and three points from since its first launch. No progress in reliability, despite many complaints from users.

author: Mark Swartwood
comment: Overall works great. Originally failed to update due to a faulty module in the car which was no fault of the app. Ford warranty replaced the module and now works as advertised. Really enjoy it.

author: JF H
comment: This is a joke of an app. Doesn't work over 90% of the time. If you call ford for issues regarding the app they want you to take the vehicle in to a dealer. Every year since I had this app I  had problems.

author: Dave Toso
comment: This is a very hard to use app, super clunky. Because I really wanted to use some of the features I put in the effort to get it working.   Now it has stopped working after 6 months. I spent several hours over the weekend trying to get it to work again with no luck. I called the sync support line today and they tell me that I need the firmware of my modem upgraded and the app will then work again.  Hey Ford, you should let us know when your stuff is not going to work. So easy for you to contact us to let us know what we need to do to get this working again. Or just give us a head's up that something is going to stop working.   I would like to roll back my version of the app to work with my old firmware, but Ford makes you go to a dealer to  upgrade the firmware...Ford has no chance of competing with Tesla when it comes to technology.

author: Phu Ngo
comment: Nice. But buggy in many place notably syncing (annoyingly slow). Value charge has strange behavior in not honoring weekend schedule.

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of your issues with our app. If you’re continuing to experience these issues with the latest version of the app, please contact help desk 800-392 3673, choose your language and option 3 for Technology. We will be happy to get more details to assist you in getting your concern resolved.

author: Amy Brent
comment: Always states it is updating and never connects to my car.  So disappointed because I can't pre-heat my car in this 19 degree freeze!!

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of your issues with our app.  A firmware update for our Telematics Control unit , Inoperative Remote Commands From MyFord Mobile Phone App, is available at the dealership. If you’re continuing to experience these issues, please contact 800-392 3673 to further assist you in getting your concerns resolved.

author: melanie carambia
comment: I log into app and it tells me the vehicle is in sleep mode, even when I am driving the vehicle it tells me the vehicle is in sleep mode. How do you take it out of sleep mode?

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Deep Sleep mode is designed to conserve battery power on your vehicle. To deactivate Deep Sleep mode, simply manually start your vehicle. If you’re continuing to experience these issues with the latest version of the app, please contact help desk 800-392 3673. We will be happy to get more details to assist you in getting your concern resolved.

author: Thomas Pope
comment: MPG is way way off last few weeks. Gives mpg in 1000's when using gas and 0.1 when all electric. Now won't even update. Minus 1 star.

author: Jeff Ingebretsen
comment: Was unable to login, said password wasn't correct. Recovered password temporary password doesn't work. Haven't even used it yet already hate it.

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of your login issues.  If you’re continuing to experience these issues with the latest version of the app, please contact help desk 800-392 3673, choose your language and option 3 for Technology. We will be happy to get more details to assist you in getting your concern resolved.

author: T.J. Kalifornia
comment: This app is so bad ive called a tow truck 5 times in the last year because never updates or works or a module is blown etc. Buy a Chevy 🖓

Sync 3 in the vehicle specifically tells you to use the app,  then find out its not compatible with this vehicle.  Apparently it's to hard to program things to say the right info for the sync department.

author: jmcx1969
comment: The Sync screen in my F350 said to use this app for updating but it wouldn't register the vehicle. Turns out it is for electric vehicles only. The app should be called EVFord and my diesel pickup shouldn't be suggesting it.

author: Jay Jewell
comment: When it worked I loved it, but like a lot of posts here it also stopped working after a few months

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of your issues with our app.  A firmware update for our Telematics Control unit , Inoperative Remote Commands From MyFord Mobile Phone App, is available at the dealership. If you’re continuing to experience these issues, please contact 800-392 3673 to further assist you in getting your concerns resolved.

author: Jeff Daniels
comment: Zero stars! App worked for a few months. Now stuck in menu. No functionality.

reply.author: Ford Motor Co.
reply.content: Sorry to hear of your issues with our app.  A firmware update for our Telematics Control unit, Inoperative Remote Commands From MyFord Mobile Phone App, is available at the dealership. If you’re continuing to experience these issues, please contact 800-392 3673 to further assist you in getting your concerns resolved.
